#summary All about the SQL CLR DataAudit.

= SQL CLR DataAudit =

All about the SQL CLR DataAudit.


== Install ==

To use the trigger on a test database:
  * Open the project in Visual Studio 2005
  * Build the project
  * Open the SQL Scripts in SQL Server Management Studio
  * Create a new empty database
  * Change the project path in Test.sql
  * Run both scripts
